structure.unit: ARTICLE XII. PUBLIC AND BUS PASSENGER BENCHES AND SHELTERS

text.section:
Sec. 21-159. Construction and maintenance.
Benches shall conform to the approved standards and specifications on file with the Product Control Branch of the Code Compliance Department. A permittee shall maintain each bus passenger bench in a good state of repair and appearance, and shall keep the area surrounding each bench free of debris, high grass, weeds, and other rubbish for a radius of seven (7) feet from the center of the bench. Failure to properly maintain the bench or the surrounding area shall constitute cause for cancellation of the permit and removal of the bench as provided in.
